meanings.definition: To breed or produce by combining different varieties or species
meanings.sent1: The farmer hybridized two types of roses to create a new flower.
meanings.sent2: Scientists hybridized different types of corn to make it more resistant to pests.
meanings.sent3: The chef hybridized strawberries and bananas to make a unique smoothie.
meanings.sent4: She hybridized her love for music with her passion for painting to create beautiful art.
meanings.sent5: The artist hybridized colors to make a stunning masterpiece.

meanings.definition: To mix or blend different elements or styles
meanings.sent1: The DJ hybridized different music genres to create a unique sound.
meanings.sent2: The interior designer hybridized modern and traditional styles in the living room.
meanings.sent3: The comedian hybridized jokes from different eras to entertain the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her fashion sense hybridized vintage clothing with modern accessories.
meanings.sent5: The chef hybridized flavors to create a delicious fusion dish.
